document_data.name: Ochio
document_data.mainbody: '''Ochio''' was the [[myoshu]] of [[Myudo]] village in [[Kozakura]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.History: In 1357 DR, Myudo was under the control of evil [[sohei]] of the [[Black Temple]] who terrorized Ochio and other villagers with stories of the [[dai-oni]] who led them. They forced Ochio and others to assist in rituals to the dai-oni and to pay heavy tributes.
document_data.Personality: Ochio did not like responsibility, being an indecisive individual. Also, in private, he was dominated by his wife.
